recipe.title: How to Make a Banana Split
recipe.intro: A banana split is a fun dessert with banana, ice cream, and toppings. It is perfect for a hot day in Cairns!
recipe.ingredients: bananas, vanilla ice cream, chocolate ice cream, strawberry ice cream, chocolate sauce, strawberry sauce, whipped cream, sprinkles, cherries
steps: **Peel** one banana and **cut** it in half lengthwise.
**Place** the two banana halves in a long dish, one on each side.
**Scoop** three balls of ice cream between the banana halves: vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry.
**Drizzle** chocolate sauce over the chocolate ice cream and strawberry sauce over the strawberry ice cream.
**Top** everything with a big swirl of whipped cream.
**Sprinkle** colourful sprinkles on top and **finish** with a cherry on each scoop. **Serve** immediately!

quiz1.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"Scoop three balls of ice cream."

review.text: If you love ice cream, you must visit Tropical Bliss! I went there on a hot afternoon and ordered a banana split. It was huge! The banana was fresh and sweet. They had so many ice cream flavours to choose from. I picked mango, coconut, and chocolate. The chocolate sauce was rich and the whipped cream was perfect. My friend ordered a sundae and she loved it too. This place is a must-visit in Cairns!

quiz2.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"I picked mango, coconut, and chocolate."

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Hello! Can I get you any dessert today?

lines.speaker: Mr. Baker
lines.text: Yes, please! What ice cream desserts do you have?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: We have banana splits, sundaes, and ice cream cones.

lines.speaker: Mrs. Baker
lines.text: Oh, I would love a banana split! What flavours are there?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: We have vanilla, chocolate, strawberry, mango, and coconut.

lines.speaker: Mrs. Baker
lines.text: I will have vanilla, mango, and coconut, please.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Lovely! And any extra toppings? We have chocolate sauce, caramel, and sprinkles.

lines.speaker: Mr. Baker
lines.text: I will just have a double scoop in a cone. Chocolate and mango.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Sure thing! That will be twenty-two dollars altogether.

lines.speaker: Mr. Baker
lines.text: Perfect. Can we sit outside? It is a beautiful evening.

quiz3.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"I will just have a double scoop in a cone."

part_a.full_text: It is so hot today! I know, it is thirty-five degrees. Do you want to get some ice cream after work? Yes, that sounds amazing. There is a new ice cream shop on the corner. Really? What flavours do they have? They have tropical flavours like mango and passion fruit. Nice! I love passion fruit. Let us go at five o'clock. Perfect, I cannot wait!

gaps.before: Do you want to get some ice cream after
There is a new ice cream shop on the

part_b.full_text: Welcome to Sunny Scoops! We are open seven days a week from ten in the morning to nine at night. We have over fifteen flavours of ice cream, all made with fresh local ingredients. Our most popular flavour is tropical mango. Try our famous banana split for only twelve dollars. Kids can get a small cone for just three dollars fifty on Tuesdays. We also do birthday party packages for groups of ten or more. Ask our staff for details. Follow us on social media for special offers!

try_it.example: My favourite ice cream flavour is mango. I want to eat a banana split at the beach on a hot day. I will put chocolate sauce and sprinkles on top!
